divs: Sighting Details Driving home from store to buycigarettes,I drove down my street which the moon was straight ahead of my carwith a perfect view of the moon at a low angle.There was a huge square blockdark spot on the left lower of the moon, approx. at the 8 oclock position. Ithen drove to get a different angle of view which was a mistake on my part,whichtook less than a half a minute,because the object was gone when I got back to myoriginal position. I deduce that this was something really HUGE blocking theview of the moon from its appearance.
